translations: 卡丁车运动；小型汽车游戏

sentences.sentence: This was one of the keys to my success on the karting circuits.
sentences.translation: 这是我在卡丁车赛道上成功的关键之一。

sentences.sentence: To Australia, the Americas, such as recreational sport Karting.
sentences.translation: 到澳大利亚，美洲的休闲运动卡丁车等。

sentences.sentence: I can only say thanks and also thanks to all the people back in karting.
sentences.translation: 我只能说谢谢，同样感谢那些卡丁时代的人们。
